Hello again HB community!

I figured it’s about time for another promo, exclusively offered on HostBalls at this time. So if you want to try out a new monitoring solution, or if you’re already on our free package and wish to double your limits, this is a good chance to do so.

This promo is very simple and it won’t cost you anything. We’re doubling the limits of the free packages, for free.

So, you’ll be getting:

Blacklist Monitoring:

  • 32 64 Blacklist Monitors
  • 160+ RBLs
    See all features on our Blacklist Monitoring Pricing Page:
    Blacklist Monitor Pricing - HetrixTools

Uptime Monitoring:

  • 5 10 Uptime Monitors (monitor the uptime status of your website,server,services,etc)
  • 5 10 Server Monitors (monitor your server resources and configure alerts for high usage)
  • 1 minute check frequency
  • Select 3 out of 12 monitoring locations
  • Domain expiration monitor, SSL expiration monitor, nameservers change detection, etc.
    See all features on our Uptime Monitoring Pricing Page:
    Uptime Monitor Pricing - HetrixTools

Included in all packages:

  • Private/Public Uptime Reports
  • White Label Reports
  • Bulk Reports (Public Status Page, example)
  • Account Activity required (as with any of our free accounts)
  • Notifications via Email, SMS, PushBullet, Pushover, Twitter, Slack, Discord, HipChat, PagerDuty, Telegram and Webhooks.
  • All features are included on the pricing pages linked above

How to obtain this offer:

  1. Register for a free HetrixTools account (if you don’t already have one)
  2. Reply in this thread with your account’s Public Key, found here https://hetrix.tools/public-key
  3. Your account will be manually upgraded to the double free package (within 24hrs)

Promo Notes:

  • cannot stack with any other of our promos
  • valid only for free accounts
  • valid only for the first 20 keys

Please allow up to 24 hours for your account to be upgraded, after posting your key.
There is no need to open a support ticket about this promo upgrade.

Thanks for taking the time to read this promo post.
